name: Awesome Incorporated
overview:
Awesome Incorporated is a multidisciplinary creative studio specializing in 2D/3D animation, broadcast design, motion graphics and live action / mixed media production. Founded in 2005 by Drew Tyndell and Ashley Kohler, Awesome began as a commercial production company, and added a series division in 2011.

Awesome Inc is currently in production on two Adult Swim series, “Aqua Teen Hunger Force” and “Squidbillies.” AI also continues to make award-winning promos, show packaging and commercials for clients such as Nickelodeon / Nick@Nite, Fuel TV, Saatchi & Saatchi, Cartoon Network / Adult Swim, Grey Worldwide, CNN, mun2, Fitzgerald+Co., The Weather Channel, and Discovery Networks
